content.question: Which of the following conclusions can be drawn from the data comparing fluid intelligence and crystallized intelligence over the life span of a person?

choices.label: Fluid intelligence tends to be stable over the life span.
Crystallized intelligence is at its highest level in early childhood.
Crystallized intelligence and fluid intelligence begin to diverge around 30 years of age.
Fluid intelligence is more developed than crystallized intelligence until puberty.

content.answer: Crystallized intelligence and fluid intelligence begin to diverge around 30 years of age.

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
